en.subject: We miss you, {{ firstName }}! ЁЯСЛ
en.preheader: It's been a week - see what's new in Purra

header.title: We Miss You!
header.subtitle: Come back and see what's new

body.intro: We noticed you haven't logged into Purra since **{{ lastLoginDate }}**. We've been busy improving the platform and we'd love to have you back!

whatYouMissed.title: What You've Missed
items: **New vendor intelligence features** - Better risk detection and compliance monitoring
**Enhanced price alerts** - More accurate predictions and faster notifications
**Improved analytics** - New dashboards and visualization options
**Performance upgrades** - Faster report generation and search

quickWins.title: Quick Things You Can Do Today
items: Run a vendor due diligence check (takes 5 minutes)
Set up price alerts for your key products

needHelp.title: Need Help Getting Started?
needHelp.description: Our team is here to help. Book a quick 15-minute session or reach out anytime.

body.footer: Your data and preferences are exactly as you left them. Jump back in anytime!
